noChannelId: Could nah discover a channel wit' that ID!
noMessageId: Could nah discover a message wit' that ID!
noPoll: It be lookin' like that message does nah have a poll in it. If it does, please contact th' developer about 'tis.
noPollDb: We could nah find that poll in our database! Please contact th' bot developer about 'tis an' create a new poll.
errorNotOwner: Only th' creator o' th' poll can view its results before it ends!
endingWarningDesc: 'Tis poll be scheduled t' end on %%fullTime%% (%%relativeTime%%), so ye probably do nah wanna end it just yet. If ye do, confirm usin' th' button below.
didntReply: Ye did nah reply, so 'tis poll shall nah end now
successCancelEnd: Successfully cancelled th' endin' o' 'tis poll!
endScheduled: It shall instead end on th' scheduled time: %%fullTime%% (%%relativeTime%%)
alreadyVoted: Ye have already voted fer 'tis option, so yer vote nah be changed.
